sourcesContent:
export const Colors = {
  // Primary Colors
  primary: '#0F5189',
  primaryLight: '#337DBD',
  primaryDark: '#0A3A6B',
  
  // Secondary Colors
  secondary: '#EAA141',
  secondaryLight: '#F4B76A',
  secondaryDark: '#D18A2A',
  
  // Accent Colors
  accent: '#E32652',
  accentLight: '#FF6388',
  accentDark: '#C41E3A',
  
  // Background Colors
  background: '#FFFFFF',
  backgroundSecondary: '#F8F9FA',
  backgroundDark: '#0E0E0F',
  
  // Text Colors
  textPrimary: '#000000',
  textSecondary: '#666666',
  textLight: '#A4A9AE',
  textWhite: '#FFFFFF',
  
  // Status Colors
  success: '#52C93F',
  warning: '#FFC107',
  error: '#FF2727',
  info: '#3B8AFF',
  
  // Gray Scale
  gray50: '#F9FAFB',
  gray100: '#F3F4F6',
  gray200: '#E5E7EB',
  gray300: '#D1D5DB',
  gray400: '#9CA3AF',
  gray500: '#6B7280',
  gray600: '#4B5563',
  gray700: '#374151',
  gray800: '#1F2937',
  gray900: '#111827',
  
  // Button Colors
  clientButton: '#337DBD',
  assistantButton: '#0F5189',
  lawyerButton: '#EAA141',
  
  // Border Colors
  border: '#E5E7EB',
  borderLight: '#F3F4F6',
  
  // Shadow Colors
  shadow: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
  shadowDark: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)',
};

export default Colors;
